name: Ron Weasley
quote: You're a little scary sometimes, you know that? Brilliant ... but scary.

name: Ron Weasley
quote: Hearing voices no one else can hear isn’t a good sign, even in the wizarding world.

name: Ron Weasley
quote: Don’t let the muggles get you down.

name: Fred Weasley
quote: He can run faster than Severus Snape confronted with shampoo.

name: Cornelius Fudge
quote: Why, dear boy, we don’t send wizards to Azkaban just for blowing up their aunts.

name: Albus Dumbledore
quote: Do not pity the dead, Harry. Pity the living, and, above all those who live without love.

name: Nearly Headless Nick
quote: Once again, you show all the sensitivity of a blunt axe.

name: Remus Lupin
quote: It is the quality of one’s convictions that determines success, not the number of followers.

name: Albus Dumbledore
quote: Of course it is happening inside your head, Harry, but why should that mean that it is not real?

name: Albus Dumbledore
quote: It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live.

name: Albus Dumbledore
quote: Help will always be given at Hogwarts to those who ask for it.

name: Luna Lovegood
quote: Don’t worry. You’re just as sane as I am.

name: Luna Lovegood
quote: Which came first, the phoenix or the flame? I think the answer is that a circle has no beginning.

name: Hermione Granger
quote: I mean, it's sort of exciting, isn't it, breaking the rules?

name: George Weasley
quote: I solemnly swear that I am up to no good.

name: Albus Dumbledore
quote: Happiness can be found, even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light.

name: Albus Dumbledore
quote: It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to your enemies, but a great deal more to stand up to your friends.

name: Albus Dumbledore
quote: Oh, to be young and to feel love's keen sting.

name: Albus Dumbledore
quote: Soon we must all face the choice between what is right and what is easy.

name: Albus Dumbledore
quote: It is not our abilities that show what we truly are. It is our choices.

name: Dolores Umbridge
quote: I must not tell lies.

name: Harry Potter
quote: I’ll be in my bedroom, making no noise and pretending I don't exist.
